headline: Report: Oz Looks to Exit Senate Race, Return to Television
author: Jordan Dixon-Hamilton
sentences: https://www.breitbart.com/politics/2021/12/25/report-dr-oz-on-trans-swimmer-we-have-to-have-compassion/ "A review of his broadcasts suggests Dr. Oz has used his show to promote transgender ideology, including things like mastectomies on healthy teen girls and using pharmaceutical drugs to prevent puberty on healthy children," Michael Geer, president and CEO of the Pennsylvania Family Institute, told Fox News Digital."
